participant_1.background:
My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.
i am a member of the ymca.
my nickname is bubblegum.
i like to swim.
my favorite subject in school is math.

participant_2.background:
I believe that I have a good relationship with my family.
I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
i have freckles all over my face.
during the week , i work as a barista.
I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Hello! Not bad, just working on my movie memorabilia collection.
Oh that's cool, what kind of movies do you like?
I love all kinds of movies, but my favorite are horror and sci-fi.
I love sci-fi too! What are your favorite sci-fi movies?
I love all of the Star Wars movies, and I also really like the Alien movies.
Those are both great movies! I'm also a big fan of the Terminator movies.
Oh yeah, those are great too! I love Arnold Schwarzenegger in those movies.
Me too! He's so cool. So, what do you do for a living?
I work as a barista during the week, but I'm also a writer.
Oh that's awesome! Do you write books or screenplays?
I write both, but I'm more focused on screenplays right now.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be very successful.
